body_html: @apaszke and I discussed offline. We'll stick with serialized testing for now since it's hard to come up with ways of ensuring backwards compatibility that are both clean and reliable. However, to address the issue of adding a bunch of small files to git, we'll instead store the files in S3/gluster. This PR will be put on hold until then.

body: @apaszke and I discussed offline. We'll stick with serialized testing for now since it's hard to come up with ways of ensuring backwards compatibility that are both clean and reliable. However, to address the issue of adding a bunch of small files to git, we'll instead store the files in S3/gluster. This PR will be put on hold until then.
